short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reverses light colors to dark and dark text to light

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This experimental extension goes through a page's CSS and looks for dark text and light colors. It then reverses the lightness of these colors. This is done by manipulating the existing CSS rules.

Some hosts prohibit downloading external CSS (cors); for such pages Dark Mode might not work properly.

For support reach out to dark-mode@nann.in.
